ods.t: What are the Sustainable Development Goals?
ods.1st:
The Sustainable Development Goals are a call to action to end poverty, protect the planet, and ensure that all people enjoy peace and prosperity by 2030.
 They try to achieve this by addressing the global challenges we face, including those related to poverty, inequality, climate change, environmental degradation, peace, and justice.
 The 17 Goals are all interconnected, and to leave no one behind, it is essential to achieve them all by 2030.
ods.title: What other SDGs are there?
ods.st: There are 17 Sustainable Development Goals in the 2030 Agenda, which are:

modal.st: Click on each link to see them!

1.title: No Poverty
1.desc: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

2.title: Zero Hunger
2.desc: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture

3.title: Good Health and Well-being
3.desc: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

4.title: Quality Education
4.desc: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

5.title: Gender Equality
5.desc: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

6.title: Clean Water and Sanitation
6.desc: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

7.title: Affordable and Clean Energy
7.desc: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy for all

8.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
8.desc: Promote sustained, inclusive, and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment, and decent work for all

9.title: Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure
9.desc: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization, and foster innovation

10.title: Reduced Inequality
10.desc: Reduce inequality within and among countries

11.title: Sustainable Cities and Communities
11.desc: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable

12.title: Responsible Consumption and Production
12.desc: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

13.title: Climate Action
13.desc: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

14.title: Life Below Water
14.desc: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas, and marine resources for sustainable development

15.title: Life on Land
15.desc: Protect, restore, and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, halt and reverse land degradation, and halt biodiversity loss

16.title: Peace, Justice, and Strong Institutions
16.desc: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all, and build effective, accountable, and inclusive institutions at all levels

17.title: Partnerships for the Goals
17.desc: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
